transcript.title: TRANSCRIPT OF THE PRIME MINISTER THE HON JOHN HOWARD MP COMMENT FOLLOWING VISIT TO THE WORLD TRADE CENTRE SITE, NEW YORK
transcript.content:
E&OE...........

JOURNALIST:

Prime Minister, your reaction to seeing Ground Zero first hand.

PRIME MINISTER:

It';s very said, it';s very bleak. It';s overwhelming and I';m filled with admiration for men and women, many of whom have worked here since the 11th of September and I think they are people the whole world admires. It';s terrible work and they';ve got great spirit.

[ends]
